mapper.select: SELECT dataid, IMEI, pow1, grouppow, outv1, outv2, v24, v28, extendpow, solarpow, charge, workstatus, worktime, IP from where IMEI=#{id} and worktime between #{begintime} AND #{endtime} order by worktime asc
SELECT * from where IMEI=#{id} order by worktime desc limit 0,1

select dataid, IMEI, pow1, grouppow, outv1, outv2, v24, v28, extendpow, solarpow, charge, workstatus, worktime, IP from
and ${pd.key1} LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.val1}),'%')
and ${pd.key2} LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.val2}),'%')
and ${pd.key3} LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.val3}),'%')
order by worktime desc
